data.eml:eml: A new family Kazimierzidae for the genus Kazimierzus, earlier recorded to the composite Microchaetidae (Annelida, Oligochaeta)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nxele, Thembeka C., Plisko, J. D., Mwabvu, Tarombera, Zishiri, T. O. (2016): A new family Kazimierzidae for the genus Kazimierzus, earlier recorded to the composite Microchaetidae (Annelida, Oligochaeta). African Invertebrates 57 (2): 111-117, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.57.10042, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/AfrInvertebr.57.10042
